metadata.name: Suspicious Msiexec Quiet Install From Remote Location
metadata.comment: Detects usage of Msiexec.exe to install packages hosted remotely quietly

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\msiexec.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('msiexec.exe') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-i')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/i')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('–i')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('—i')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('―i')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-package')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/package')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('–package')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('—package')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('―package')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-a')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/a')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('–a')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('—a')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('―a')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-j')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/j')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('–j')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('—j')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('―j'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-q')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/q')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('–q')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('—q')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('―q'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('http')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\'))))

output.summary: Detects usage of Msiexec.exe to install packages hosted remotely quietly
